pullRequest.title: Production tests must start after a successful deployment
pullRequest.bodyText: @mpolden please review and merge. This fixes an error where a production test would be marked as complete as long as it was on the correct version, and any production deployment had previously completed

nodes.bodyText:
Consider naming endedAtOrBefore to match doc.
Nit: Javadoc says "of the given type", but there is no type given here that I can tell.
